sentences.sContent: He is in charge of the school work.
If you have kids, then you can’t help but have some clutter with toys and school work.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有孩子，那么你只能成天徘徊于堆积如山的玩具和学校的事情中。

sentences.sContent: The big demand is for teachers-turned-nannies, who can help the kids with increasingly demanding school work.
sentences.sCn: 做过老师的保姆需求量很大，她们可以帮助孩子完成要求越来越高的学校作业。
